âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Track personal Bluetooth devices via Apple's Find My network â€¢ Build custom Find My network without Apple hardware â€¢ Firmware for various microcontrollers (Adafruit Bluefruit, BBC Microbit, Seeed Studio XIAO, etc.) â€¢ Beacon code for Linux systems (Raspberry Pi, etc.) â€¢ TinyScan hardware scanner for local devices
ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides tools and firmware to build a custom Find My network using various microcontrollers and Linux systems. It includes a hardware scanner (TinyScan) for local devices and integrates with OpenHaystack and Macless-Haystack. No Apple hardware is required.
